title: It's a boy: Naomi Biden, Joe Biden's granddaughter, gives birth
shortDescription: Joe Biden became a great-grandfather on Wednesday after his eldest granddaughter, Naomi Biden, gave birth to her first child.

title: House passes Laken Riley Act as more Democrats express support of bill
shortDescription: The House of Representatives passed the Laken Riley Act 264-159. Some critics say it could pose a threat to civil liberties while supporters say it will make the U.S. safer.

title: Joe Biden's exit interview: Susan Page on exclusive sit-down interview
shortDescription: How does he hope history captures his single term in office? Susan Page interviewed President Biden before he leaves office later this month.

title: President Biden says home of Hunter Biden under threat by California wildfires
shortDescription: Hunter Biden was originally notified his house was likely "burned to the ground," President Biden said, but now "it appears it may still be standing."

title: Donald Trump blames California Gov. Gavin Newsom for wildfires
shortDescription: Trump has said he would turn on “a very large faucet” that could send millions of gallons of water from the Columbia River to Los Angeles.

title: Trump, a feud over Greenland and a shape-shifting Danish royal coat of arms
shortDescription: Denmark's king changed his royal coat of arms to give Greenland a more space after Donald Trump said he wanted to purchase the territory.

title: Mexico president claps back at Trump 'Gulf of America' idea
shortDescription: Mexico President Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo responded with a counter-offer to President-elect Donald Trump's plan to rename the Gulf of Mexico.

title: Blinken says Trump bid to take over Greenland 'not a good' idea
shortDescription: Trump on Tuesday reiterated his interest in taking control of Greenland, an autonomous territory of Denmark.

title: Trump invites indicted Brazilian ex-president to inauguration
shortDescription: Bolsonaro said his lawyer has already made a request to get his passport back so he could “attend this honorable and important historical event.”

title: Merrick Garland intends to release DOJ Jan. 6 report on Trump election charges
shortDescription: Justice Department lawyers said the plan is to release a special counsel report about Trump's election interference charges, not classified documents.

title: Trump won't rule out military force to acquire Greenland, Panama Canal
shortDescription: Plus: California Gov. Gavin Newsom declares a state of emergency as the Palisades Fire rages. Illegal immigration plummets at the U.S.-Mexico border.

title: Biden reflects on decision to pardon his son Hunter
shortDescription: USA TODAY Washington Bureau Chief Susan Page reveals what President Biden told her when asked about his decision to pardon his son, Hunter.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to block sentencing in NY hush money case
shortDescription: Trump said Friday's sentencing should be paused while he argues to the Supreme Court his conviction should be overturned due to presidential immunity.

title: Trump is determined to get Greenland and the Panama Canal. Here's why
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump wouldn't rule out military or economic coercion, saying the U.S. needs to stop China. Also a factor: climate change.

title: Biden reflects on his presidency in exit interview with USA TODAY
shortDescription: USA TODAY Washington Bureau Chief Susan Page discusses her exclusive interview with President Biden on the election, his family and his legacy.

title: Biden officials warn health insurance costs could 'skyrocket' in 2026
shortDescription: ACA signups reach record levels with generous subsidies. Biden administration officials urge Congress to extend subsidies beyond this year.

title: Joe Biden says his granddaughter Naomi is scheduled for C-section Wednesday
shortDescription: 'I'm about to be a great-grandfather, Jesus God,' Biden said. He told USA TODAY his granddaughter Naomi was scheduled to give birth Wednesday.

title: Where will Joe Biden build his presidential library?
shortDescription: Joe Biden, who leaves office in two weeks, tells USA TODAY he hasn't picked a location for his presidential library.

title: 'Good record': Biden said Trump complimented some of his economic policies
shortDescription: High prices were a top concern among voters in the 2024 presidential election – and they were a driving force as to why Donald Trump won.

title: 7 takeaways from President Biden's exclusive interview with USA TODAY
shortDescription: President Joe Biden pondered the outcome had he stayed in the 2024 election and other takeaways from an exclusive interview with USA TODAY.

title: Joe Biden on his son, Hunter: 'Thank God he's doing really well'
shortDescription: In an exclusive interview with USA TODAY, President Joe Biden explains what prompted him to change his mind and pardon his son.

title: Biden mulls pardons after urging Trump not to 'settle scores'
shortDescription: President Biden told USA TODAY he hasn't decided yet whether to offer preemptive pardons to certain people to protect them from President-elect Trump.

title: Biden remarks during exclusive USA TODAY interview: Transcript
shortDescription: From Donald Trump to inflation to life after the White House: Transcript of Joe Biden's exclusive interview with USA TODAY's SUSAN PAGE

title: Joe Biden: When my friend Jimmy Carter asked me to deliver his eulogy
shortDescription: Exclusive: They were friends before either was a figure in national politics. Joe Biden tells USA TODAY about his last meeting with Jimmy Carter.

title: Exclusive: Biden says yes, he could have won reelection
shortDescription: In an exit interview with USA TODAY, President Joe Biden talks pardons, policy, politics and family.
